page.title: 04ENTERTAINMENT:SPORTS:LANGTON
page.content: IN THE{LANGTON HERRING}AREA MOST SPORTS ARE SOMETHING TO DO WITH{GAME LIKE{FISHING}AND{SHOOTING.}THERE ARE ALSO TRADITIONAL{SPORTS}SUCH AS {FOOTBALL, CRICKET AND BOULE. EVERY NOW AND AGAIN THERE ARE{CLAY {PIGEON SHOOTS}AT{HIGHER FARM.}PEOPLE COME FROM NEAR BY VILLAGES TO TAKE PART.THERE ARE THREE{CLAY PIGEON SECTIONS: {1 CLAY AT A TIME, 2 CLAYS AT THE {SAME HEIGHT AND TWO CLAYS ONE HIGH AND {ONE LOW. THE WINNER IS THE PERSON WHO {HAS SHOT THE MOST CLAYS OVERALL. EVERY FRIDAY NIGHT ABOUT 10 LOCALS GATHER AT THE ELM TREE INN TO PLAY {BOULE.}IT GOES ON FROM ABOUT 8:30 - 10:30. {CRICKET}IS PLAYED BY THE{ELM TREE {INN CRICKET TEAM.}THEY PLAY EVERY SUNDAY IN THE SUMMER WEATHER PERMITTING UNDER THEIR CAPTAIN{D.ROSS
